job_tasks.phrase: realisatie van producten met Machine Learning, Deep Learning, OCR, Computer Vision, LLM's en meer
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions the realization of products using Machine Learning, Deep Learning, OCR, Computer Vision, and LLMs, all of which are core components of model development and application.
The term 'AI deployment pipelines' directly refers to the operational aspects of getting AI models into production, which falls under MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: implementatie zal je werken aan de realisatie van producten
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'realisatie van producten' (realization of products) implies the software development necessary to build and deliver functional AI-driven products.

soft_skills.phrase: interesse voor data, innovatie en AI

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions working with LLMs and Generative AI, along with MLOps tools like Docker and Kubernetes. This focus on generative models and their deployment strongly aligns with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
